00002 #define MIPConstants_h 1

00008 #include <cmath>
00009 #include "lcio.h"
00010 #include <LCHcalCalibrationObject.hh>
00011 
00012 using namespace lcio;
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00015 
00016 class MIPConstants;
00017 
00025 class MIPConstants: public LCHcalCalibrationObject{
00026 
00027 public:
00028   
00029   MIPConstants() {};
00030   
00031   MIPConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float value, float error): _cutValue(0.5) {
00032     unsigned _id = (chip << 8) + channel;
00033     setCellKey(_id);
00034     obj()->setFloatVal(0, value);
00035     obj()->setFloatVal(1, error);
00036   };
00037   
00038   MIPConstants(LCObject* obj): LCHcalCalibrationObject(obj), _cutValue(0.5) {};
00039   
00040   virtual ~MIPConstants() {};
00041 
00044   float getMIPValue() const {
00045     return getFloatVal(0);
00046   };  
00047 
00050   float getMIPError() const {  
00051     return getFloatVal(1);
00052   };
00053   
00056   float applyCalibration(float inputValue) const {
00057     return (float) (inputValue / getMIPValue());
00058   };
00059   
00062   float cancelCalibration(float outputValue) const {
00063     return (float) (outputValue * getMIPValue());
00064   };  
00065   
00068   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError) const {
00069     return (float) (sqrt(pow(inputError/inputValue,2)+pow(getMIPError()/getMIPValue(),2))*(inputValue/getMIPValue()));
00070   };
00071   
00074   float cancelCalibrationError(float outputValue, float outputError) const {
00075     return (float) (outputValue * getMIPError() + getMIPValue() * outputError);
00076   };      
00077 
00080   bool calibrationValid() const {
00081     return (!std::isnan(getMIPValue()) && (getMIPValue()>0));
00082   };
00083 
00086   bool keepEvent(float resultValue, float resultError) const {
00087     return resultValue > _cutValue;
00088   };
00089   
00090   float getParam(unsigned paramIndex) {
00091     if (paramIndex==0) return _cutValue; 
00092     else {
00093       throw std::runtime_error("parameter index not valid");
00094     }  
00095   };
00096   
00097   void setParam(unsigned paramIndex, float paramValue) {
00098     if (paramIndex==0) _cutValue = paramValue;
00099     else {
00100       throw std::runtime_error("parameter index not valid");
00101     }
00102   };
00103 
00106   void print (std::ostream& os);
00107   
00110   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00111     return "MIPConstants";
00112   };   
00113 
00116   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00117     return "i:CellKey,f:MIPValue,f:MIPError";
00118   };
00119   
00120 protected:
00121   float _cutValue; 
00122     
00123 };
00124 
00125 }
